website_summaries.verdict: A lot of bags for less cost than the competitors, yet they offer comparable strength – the best deal available.
pros: Both affordable and durable – pack contains 1,000 bags made of EPI plastic that stands up to tears and leaks
Comes with a free bag dispenser
cons: On the short side (12"), and they are somewhat sheer – you can almost see the contents
Takes some effort to open them

website_summaries.verdict: A reasonable deal, provided you don't expect to use them with a standard waste bag dispenser.
pros: Affordably priced, as you get 1,000 bags (50 rolls with 20 bags each) and a bag dispenser with a patented design
Sturdy enough for most cleanup tasks
cons: Fairly transparent, so waste is somewhat visible
Some customers wish they were longer

customer_reviews.title: They were great until we had a defective roll in the package.
customer_reviews.text: We've used about 8 rolls of these so far and all were fine, but then I grabbed a new roll from the box and came to realize, when picking up my dogs waste, the bag had no closed end and fell out the other side when I went to tie it. I thought, oh ok a defective one, but nope I got another and another and they are all unsealed. The whole roll is defective and none of the bags are sealed on one end. They are all opened on both sides!! I hope the rest of the box of bags aren't like this, but I'm not buying from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid bags
customer_reviews.text: These are good solid bags. I have used 500 so far, without one bag failure or defective bag. I have a 90lb and a 47lb dog. I have used many bags over the years. Some are weak, some smell terrible and some are difficult to open. I have no problems with these bags. The only thing that I think these bags are missing is some kind of marking to show the top of the bag. I usually look for the seam on the bottom. The dispenser that comes with these bags is nice, it rips the bags off leaving a tab to grab the next one.
customer_reviews.author: EJen

customer_reviews.title: Bags that don't have a seal - poop falls right through
customer_reviews.text: Half of the bags in the order don't remain closed. You tear off one bag, the seam on one side should stay closed so you can capture the feces. Half of them don't seal and it becomes a tunnel rather than a bag. It's intermittent in one roll, not every roll, not every bag on every roll, but about 1/2 - 2/3 on many rolls.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: See-through and poor quality bags
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this brand a shot after reading all the good reviews, and I wanted to feel good about bringing less plastic waste to the world. However, unlike some reviewers stated it, these bags are see-through and not durable. The second poop bag I used ripped off while I was picking up the poop, so yes, that will be also the last bag of this brand that I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Sticking with Amazon brand next time
customer_reviews.text: My giant box of amazon brand doggy bags finally ran out (after 2 years). I got these ones base on price point and reviews. It’s cheaper than amazon brand but unfortunately also less effective. Poo is not something I want to feel, and with this bag I definitely felt it, Inch by inch of doo doo. The amazon brand is thicker and of higher quality. This one feels more like the free ones they have at the dog parks. The box and the dispenser these bags came with is pretty cool though. Next time (probably in another two years) I will fork out the extra few dollars for the higher quality bags.
customer_reviews.author: Bao

customer_reviews.title: Thin and poop smell comes right through onto your hands!
customer_reviews.text: Going back to Earth Rated. I used up the box because I hated to waste them, but I disliked each and every bag. The end is hard to open. But the main reason for my 1 star rating is this: The bags are very thin and porous. Once you put dog poop in them, the smell of the dog poop comes right through the thin, porous plastic, and gets all over your hands. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Of Hope

customer_reviews.title: Best value for dog bags!
customer_reviews.text: I've yet to have any of these tear when I tried to open and carry them around. You just can't beat the price for the bags. Theyre poop bags... as long as they dont rip Im getting the cheapest ones!
customer_reviews.author: Ada Wong

customer_reviews.title: Greatest product for the price - price per unit is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this product (first time in blue, now in green). Good quality at an unbeatable price. Eco friendly but it's not so thin it rips. I have no complaints. I did lose the first dog bone dispenser pretty early. The plastic attachment is not the best. But I didn't buy it for the dispenser so I still give it 5 stars. There are much better dispensers on sale on Amazon that will last a long time and that will fit 2 rolls instead of just one so you don't use the last one without having back-up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a pretty bright green, they stand out from a crowd, but they do their job. They are sturdy, only one instance of a failure (of the stinky kind) and that was when used on concrete. They unroll easily and have a tab to find the next one on the roll. I love that they do not have a center plastic piece to throw away, but in the holder it is hard to tell how many are left and I am worried about using them all with no notice. I love the box they come in, it doubles as a storage for them. An overall good quality and I will purchase them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Buying Again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bags for a dispenser I made using an outdoor electrical outlet cover. These bags are great, for the price you can't beat it. I like the scented bags, but for this price it's not even a debate. These are thick bags and just like the ones I've purchased at the store for double the price. I 100% suggest these.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Used about 4 rolls, and have been very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: These were the cheapest poop bags I could find on amazon. I was tired of paying $5 for a few rolls at the grocery store, and decided to try the bags at the dollar store. Almost every single dollar store bag was defective (bottom wasn't sealed). Amazon to the rescue. These are a great price, very sturdy, and honestly the dispenser is such a colossal improvement over competitors' designs. My one hint to new purchasers is to immediately pull another 2-3 inches of the new bag after tearing off the bag you're going to use. The bags have a tendency to retreat back into the dispenser after walking for a while.
customer_reviews.author: xxxx

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and least impact of all the so-called biodegradable poop bags available.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that it’s not scented as I have allergies. It’s durable. Never leaked. Never tore even when I use them to pick up litter at the river including broken glass. Big enough and not too long so it saves plastic waste. Only issue is that it’s plastic and no plastic is good for earth. But due to laws and my common courtesy, I’ll keep using these. I won’t use the other poop bags that claim they are biodegradable or compostable because their packaging is more wasteful, with such things as the hard plastic tubes they wrap the bags around (totally unnecessary and these bags don’t use em!) and the packaging of the item itself.
customer_reviews.author: NunyaT

customer_reviews.title: THESE are the Poop Bags to buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have receive TWO emails from the seller, asking if I am "enjoying" the product! After the second, I was prompted to write a response: I am thoroughly enjoying these POOP BAGS! They are the most enjoyable POOP BAGS I have ever used - and believe me, my last dog required a lot of POOP BAGS. What's so special about these? They don't leach out any of the "subject matter" (hahah, I'm an English teacher). While they aren't scented, the odor doesn't manage to escape, either. I suppose if I had a Mastiff or Great Dane I might need a mightier Poop Bag, but for my little Orphan Annie, these are the cat's meow!
customer_reviews.author: English Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased different bags over the years from dollar store bags to the fresh scent ones at Costco and Petco. These are pretty much in between. They're not as thin as I thought they would be considering the price. For a rough estimate of the quality, it's about the same as if you were to double up on those free produce bags at the grocery store. So far it's reliable for me. I read some people's experience with defective bags, which may be the case (haven't used enough to give a fair assessment) but I feel I will definitely save me money even if there turns out to be a couple of bad apples.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser feels sturdy and is easy to load. There is a little loopy thing that separates the bags as you pull the out which makes tearing them apart easy. The bags are pretty big but somewhat thin and transparent. I got the black bags after reading several reviews about the transparency. I think these will be just fine. And they feel sturdy enough to hold the poo.
customer_reviews.author: heath.s

customer_reviews.title: Great bags and dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Holder is easy to use. Having tried many different poop bags over the years, I’ve found that some are too thin, some tear at the seam, some are too small, etc... these bags aren’t the thickest I’ve ever used, but they are still sturdy (I haven’t had one rip yet in 2 months of constant use with 2 dogs). They aren’t the biggest I’ve ever used, but they are a good size (I can usually get our mastiff’s “offerings” in 1 bag). Overall, I’m very happy with these bags and with the size of the box I got, I won’t need any bags for quite awhile. But when I do finally run out, I will definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog walker approved!
customer_reviews.text: Dog-walker of 5 years and these are easily the best bags for the price. Good quality, strong, and I LOVE that they are core-less (a lot of companies claiming to be green/eco friendly still have that extra piece of trash in the middle, love that they eliminated that unnecessary waste!) I have ordered these bags multiple times. Excellent quality even if they were twice the rate so at this price, it’s the best I have found in my years of purchasing in bulk. You can look, but you’re unlikely to find a product that matches. If these were compostable, they would be the whole package!
customer_reviews.author: mara g delaney

customer_reviews.title: You’re reviewing poop bags?
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I am reviewing poop bags. You’d think there wouldn’t be much to say, but the thing that bugs me about these is that there’s no middle cylinder so they are hard to put in a basic poop bag dispenser. Although this is very low on my list of things that make life difficult, it is still annoying me well out of proportion from what it should. There. I reviewed poop bags.
customer_reviews.author: VAO

customer_reviews.title: They Do The Job
customer_reviews.text: OK, not sure what to say about poop bags. They are strong enough for my fluffy buddy's biggest deposits. Easy to open, which is handy when Fluff is eager to get away from his smelliest message. The bags themselves don't smell but do contain the nastiest of niffs. They don't break so the little bundle of smelliness is kept under control whilst in transit to a waste receptacle. My only complaint is they don't fit in all poop bag dispensers as they don't have the little plastic tube in the middle. You might need to use the dispenser that comes in the box. Which is a small pain when you already have loads of dispensers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bags for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are good quality and last us forever with my dog using two a day. The size is good for us, but we have a 11.5lbs dog that has small bowel . I'm sure the size would be sufficient for larger dogs. The quality and strength of the bags are great, and I never fear of leaks or tears. The dispenser works well and I love that the roll does not have a plastic rod in the middle. The only con for us is that I wish they were more environment friendly, but we tried those biodegradable bags and I never trusted its strength when handling the refuse.
customer_reviews.author: CharmedShopper

customer_reviews.title: Coreless!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my pet peeves is waste bags with those annoying cardboard cores in the middle. Not only are these bags just a smidgen thicker than the other ones, they are heavy duty, separate easily out of the dispenser, and they are coreless! Look, no one likes to pick up poo, but these bags at least won't tear and "accidentally" get the scat all over your hands, and if you use a poo-picker stick, these will be perfect because they are definitely hard wearing and won't rip. I'm very glad I got these on subscribe and save - they're a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Carly LeChien

customer_reviews.title: Fine holders of dog poops
customer_reviews.text: These are just getting dog poops put in them. They do that fine. Seem a little thinner than comparable AmazonBasics bags. I do like the feature that comes with these and the dispenser with the little pre-made hole along the perforation for ease of tearing one out. Just like the produce bags at the grocery store. They hide the scent just as well as any other dog poop bags I've used. Their dispenser system does mean these don't come with the wasteful little plastic roll in the middle, meaning you can't reuse a different dispenser as easily if you already have one.
customer_reviews.author: SandI

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny to think I am writing a review about poop bags - but I am here to tell you, they are not all created equal. These have been my go to for a while now and here’s why: They always open (sounds silly but some of the cheaper varieties are not cut right or something and you can’t always open them); they are sturdy; they come neatly packaged in a little box with a perforated opening (again seems silly, but it makes storing them a lot easier). These also come with a bag carrier. You also get a lot of bags, so it’s a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RobGP

customer_reviews.title: These bags bind in the dispense
customer_reviews.text: A good quality bag, but there is no center plastic tube. Therefore, they bind in the dispenser and are very hard to pull out. In my picture I compare these to the bags I was using prior. Note the green dispenser cap has a center pivot. This is on each side and these bags without the tube don’t work well. I just started carrying the roll in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: rsr417

customer_reviews.title: best so far
customer_reviews.text: These are only scrap bags; but they are sturdy, don't tear on rough pavement, never have holes in them, comparably priced and the dispenser works well. So if you are interested in bags that work as intended, don't have the wasted plastic roll in the middle and has a handy holder that (usually) catches the perforation and tears as you pull it out and leaves a tap to pull the next bag out these are the ones. With my wife and I using Seeing Eye dogs for many years I have tried many options and these are my favorite to date.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Great value and not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Let me say up front that I do not use the dispenser. It gets in the way and the plastic clip will not hold up to rough use. That said the bags themselves are great. They are NOT flimsy so I never worry about sticking my hand through. They are also relatively easy to open so it only takes a quick movement to pick up after my dog. I carry a roll in my pocket and have another role in the coat pocket. That way I am ready at all times and don't have to think about it before my dog goes out -- especially in the middle of the night. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Blestman

customer_reviews.title: Best “Doggie” bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be giving “Doggie” bags a positive review! These bags are great!! No struggle to tear off the bag, fingers don’t go through the bottom. Yes the bags are somewhat opaque however that does not impact the negative reviews... fact is everyone knows what is in your “Doggie” bag. I am a permanent fan!
customer_reviews.author: Linda5186

customer_reviews.title: Great, biodegradable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value, biodegradable (so we feel good about using them), and there are soooo many!!! And, thanks for the great bag container. The bags tear off easily and the push button makes it easy to open the little carry case. Also, thanks for not including cardboard rolls within the roll. Way to take care of the environment all around. I sometimes carry the bone carrier on my bag. The velcro hanging tab is sturdy and my dog does not have a desire to eat it. We will most certainly be buying these again and again and again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CynD-S

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, thick, dog business pick up bags
customer_reviews.text: I just started using these bags and I am actually quite pleased. They are nice and thick which I need as I have a Great Dane who requires a nice big, thick bag for her business pick up. I was a little perplexed by the dispenser at first but it is also, awesome! It rips the bag off for you so you don't have 8 bags spilling out of the dispenser which is awesome!!! I'm glad I bought these! We shall see over time and more use how they last and the dispenser lasts but for now, after only a couple of uses, I'm initially impressed. I'd say it's worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Victoriav26

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a value for the money!  Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are certainly worth the money! (I paid way more than this for bags at places like TJ Maxx/Home Goods.) These are nicely sized and sturdy/thick. A dispenser is provided, and I like how easily they come out; the dispenser even has a tab that helps them to tear off easily. My only complaint is about the dispenser. It is made of cheap materials so don't know how long it will last -- and these bags don't fit the other 2 -- better quality -- dispensers that I already have. I would still be happy with the bags if I just carry a roll with me and tear them directly off the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Mason's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Beware that these bags don't have the plastic tube in the middle but as long as you're not trying to hang them up on a fence or something it's fine. They come with the white plastic dispenser that looks like a doggy bone with velcro strip to put on your leash. Nice. The last time I ordered these was about a year ago and I've just run out! I have a small dog who does her business twice a day most days so that gives you an idea how long this box lasts. The cost is fantastic and the bags are just as good as the ones found at major pet stores that cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Compared several different brands of poo bags here on Amazon, and went with these because of the value (bags per price). I have read the reviews where people have had bags cut incorrectly meaning they weren't sealed at the bottom, and that has happened to me - but only about 2 or 3 bags out of nearly half the box that we've used so far. The bags are thinner than what the bag dispenser at our local park uses, but I've never had an issue with one tearing during use. The included dispenser is nothing fancy, but it's holding up fine, even after dropping onto the pavement a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: bswiz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice suprise
customer_reviews.text: Wonder of wonders, these bags are actually nice! These bags are an ok size, thick enough, plus they open without my licking all on my fingers and doing a search for which end is which, and all while standing under a dim street lamp in a seedy dank alley! 😳 I jest about the alley, I live in the country. When these 1000 bags are gone I'll order more. 😁 This part is true, if I live long enough. A dispenser works very nicely for a " cheap little bone " received as a free bonus in the box of poop bags. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBird

customer_reviews.title: Easier to open than some
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can actually get these open without having to wet my fingers. I switched from the black Amazon brand to these, because the last two Amazon rolls I used had bags that were split down one side. I found that out the hard way, which was a rude shock! These are more see-through, and a little smaller than the black ones, but they are fine for my medium-sized dog. A large dog's poo wouldn't fit in these bags. So far, I have not run across a split bag. I think it would be easier to spot, if I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Kindwoman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bags!! I have been buying pet bags for over a decade. Some good, some worthless, but none have been like these, especially for their price! The bags are strong, a touch thicker than the ones I had been purchasing and the dispenser, that is the BEST part!! Instead of having to search for the perforated line and tear the bag with hopes it doesn’t rip the bag; this dispenser finds the correct place for an easy tear. It is similar to a produce bag dispenser at the grocery store. So functional and easy to use! GREAT PRODUCT and I HIGHLY recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Puppy waste bag and dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I got you product I thought it was a great price for everything. But I dropped the leash on the ground and the white bag holder broke in half were it folds. I had to tape it with that gray tape my husband has. If you could have the maker use a more rubbery bag holder that would be great. Less breakage, other wise I'm happy with all the poop bags.
customer_reviews.author: Clang

customer_reviews.title: Best box of bags on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This box lasts about 3 months in our household of 2 dogs. I love the little bag holder that comes along. The bags are durable and lock in the smell. We have smaller dogs so the waste is not big but the bags are a great size. Also they separate from one another on the roll neatly and easily. The box is similar to a "Fridge box" in that there is a small section of the box you can remove to easily reach in and get a new roll from. This helps keep things neat. Finally, not having that plastic roller after we are done with a roll is great. Highly recommend! Repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 kids & 2 dogs

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have not used dog bags because when I needed them they did not dispense conveniently and were difficult to get open while at the same time managing my dog. These roll out conveniently from the dispenser and they have a tab that conveniently breaks one bag away from the next so that you don't have to guess where the perforation is. They also seem to open for use without as much fumbling. We've had dog bags in the past and I've never used them but have always just carried used plastic shopping bags instead, but these have won me over.
customer_reviews.author: Deb C.

customer_reviews.title: Great dispenser, great bags, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags a lot and the price is great too. I have two dogs and they poop a lot. These bags are large and sturdy. Sometimes I use one bag for both collections. I appreciate not having to screw the dispenser open and closed and not having to stick your fingers in a little hole to remove the bags. I recently received a dispenser that broke almost instantly, the company is sending a replacement. I am very impressed and grateful for their excellent customer service. I have bought these bags twice and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey D

customer_reviews.title: C
customer_reviews.text: If you have an end loading dispenser with the hole in the side, throw that away and get one of these. The box to set up comes with dispenses the rolls and keep them neat. The dispenser is amazing you push the button on the top drop the roll in leaving some coming out the side. It’s made so the dispenser cuts the bags out for you. you don’t have to be Thor to pull the bags out. The bags are also thicker and a tear as easily. This is the best thing I’ve ever bought to pick up poop.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Moree

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags - cute dispenser
customer_reviews.text: So I got some other dispenser and bags at PetSmart before we got our puppy...then after puppy arrived and puppy pooping 6-8 times a day, I grew to hate those bags...they were thin and the dispenser was hard to get bags out of...then I got these Gorilla supply bags...LOVE THEM! Way thicker so it was not as stinky...easier to pull out...between perforations there is a little gap so you can feel when when the perforation is there (great when walking at night) and no little plastic tube in the middle...I like this because to me it is a waste of plastic. Will definitely keep buying these bags.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Adequate. But a few notes.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice that it cuts the bag off the roll for you (when that feature works) I found that the smaller the roll gets the more likely for it to end up totally inside the dispenser and then you have to open the dispenser up and pull the bag out. I also did not realize when I purchased this that the bags will not fit nicely in other brands dispensers. Just a few things to consider if you have multiple dogs and leashes and they don’t all have the same dispenser. No scent on the bags but they are pretty thin and see through.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Silberstein

customer_reviews.title: Good bags, BEST dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Best dispenser I've ever used! We bought a pack of these over 4 years ago and we haven't used them all up, so $15 for about 5 years of use is an unbeatable value. But what we weren't expecting is how fantastic the dispenser is. It makes it so easy to get the next bag out. It finally broke after being dropped about a thousand times and I'm buying this whole thing again because I can't find another dispenser like this sold alone. Worth it, since the pup will keep pooping.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Waste Disposal Bags!
customer_reviews.text: These poop bags are the perfect size for my small, not tiny, pup. They arrived on time, well packaged, & as described on Amazon. They are sturdy, easy to tie closed, & to determine which end to open. The included bag dispenser is very handy! When you pullout bags they’re individually stopped by a catch at perforation of bag to dispense 1 at a time. Very handy! I highly recommend & will be reordering in about a year, when I run out of these bags. Perfect for our needs & very economical!
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic poop bags. Strange eating a poop bag but here we are. I've gone through one box and this is my second order of the black bags. Never had any defects. Earth friendly ish considering all the debates behind epi tech and plastics...but it's hard to avoid with a poo emitting side kick. My dog also loves pooping on concrete and the bags handle it well. They are also not see through which is good. However they are also not odor proof...so outside trashcans only.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bags I've Used!
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews of these bags and quite frankly don't get it. With 4 dogs, I go through 8 or more Gorilla Supply bags every day. I've gone through over 2,500 of these bags already and never has one broken or been defective on the roll. My pack of 4 includes 3 small dogs and 1 medium dog and the bags are adequate for all. I'll continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Weisel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags, cool dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The bags themselves are good, although they could be just a little bit larger. The dispenser is nice, as it will automatically tear the bag off for you as you unwind, but the opening (where the bags come out) should be a little more snug. It doesn't hold onto the "next" bag very well, and sometimes the bag rolls back into the dispenser. I got around this by manually pulling the bag out an extra 1/2 inch, to prevent it from rolling back in. overall, a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyL

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Poop Bags
customer_reviews.text: We have a golden retriever puppy so for now these are the perfect sized bags for him. Our one complaint is that you don't have any markings on the bag to show you which is the top and which is the bottom. But that's neither here nor there - it would just be nice if, at 2am in the dark when he drags us outside to go potty, we didn't have to fumble with the bag to find the opening. Otherwise the bags are perfect! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Wannabe Writer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, convenient, great value for what you get
customer_reviews.text: These bags are strong and don’t feel like they’ll break, which is obviously important because who wants that to happen when you’re picking up a pet mess! They have no scent, which I prefer. And the dispenser is convenient. I attached it to my leash so the bags are always with me. I will say, the bags don’t tear off from the dispenser easily - you need two hands. However, that’s not a huge deal for me. Overall, these bags and dispenser were an amazing deal and you can’t beat the value!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Badger

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: What I like about it is the lip it has for when you are pulling the bag out. Makes it much easier to get a bag. What I don't like is the way it gets loaded into the dispenser. I have had it pop open a couple times with the bags in the dispenser spilling out. My dog is a bit of a puller on the leash so having the dispenser hanging on the leash tends to get banged around a lot and probably accidentally popping the dispenser open. Overall, great idea on the way it dispenses. I would prefer a screw on method for closing the dispenser so it doesn't accidentally open when you least expect it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Deguzman

customer_reviews.title: Not all poop bags are equal
customer_reviews.text: The thickness is just right to make sure that I don't feel as if poop has seeped through. the size is big enough for my 65 lb dog size poop, but small enough for the smaller "events" without feeling wasteful. and seriously...pet peeve is taking the time to rip bags apart only to tear the next bag, these tear apart easily. They are well perforated. I just stick a finger at the seam and pull down the bag (yanking does not work well as my dad try to complain about, haha). no rips and struggle with these bags.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Poop bags with dispenser that really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs that I take for "potty" walks several times a day. I always carry poop bags with us. I've purchased several kinds of bags but particularly like these. All bags have perforated between them but these have a small slit in the middle of the perforation area making it easy to find where to tear the bags apart. I just unroll the bag between my fingers and my thumb automatically stops where the slit is located. Wow, just realized the bags come with a different kind of dispenser! This one really works! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and convenient
customer_reviews.text: A great price for a truly huge box of bags. I use them for cleaning my cats' litter box every day and I appreciate saving money on the bags. The little bone-shape dispenser is quite convenient for tearing individual bags from the rolls. The bags are a little smaller than I would like for this purpose, but I can't fault anyone but myself. They are advertised for dog waste, not litter boxes, and the dimensions are in the description.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Dispenser and Plenty of Bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags are a little smaller than the last ones I had but they are plenty big to get the job done. They dispense really easy from the dispenser. Opening the bags are definitely a lot easier than the last bags I used. I've used about 15 of them so far and they are quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: A great value and a very good dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd and these bags are big enough to take care of his cleanups. The bags are a little translucent, but much thicker than other bags I have used before. The dispenser is also much better quality than what I have seen in the pet stores at a ridiculous price. It is also simple to refill with a release button on the side that locks securely, and a convenient tab located in the center makes tearing a bag off easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's weird to review poop bags, but these are not as good as the ones I had ordered previously. They are difficult to open and I find that I have to fight with them. I'm not marking down for the free dispenser, because, well . . . it's free. It's terrible. Works adequately when the roll of bags is new, but once it's nearing depletion, the bags don't ready themselves for dispensing. You have to open the holder and dig them out. Probably not going to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Martin

customer_reviews.title: Use for diapers
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my son's diapers and they work so perfect. Contains the smell and are big enough for the biggest diapers lmao. Would highly recommend for all parents. The build is not too thin too. These are life savers. Nothing worse than a stinky house from smelly diapers. I tossed out my diaper dispenser trash can cause that thing failed at keeping the smell in and I hated how it would smoosh the diapers down causing spillage. Yuck!! These, I simply put the diaper in it, tie it up, and toss in my trash can. No mess or smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Borquez

customer_reviews.title: Good dog waste bags without the wasteful cardboard roll
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered some dog bags from another vendor and they did very well. I cannot say whether they actually break down, only because I don't have one placed in the ground since 12 months ago. I purchased these because I had a better value (price per item). I found out that these do not have the cardboard roll in the middle, which I was a fan of for reducing waste. The bag dispenser works well to separate bags when you pull one out. The bags are blue as shown, which doesn't bother me (the others were green), but they also don't have a smell, which I preferred to not have. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: 17keos

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I live in MN (frozen tundra) and my husband isn’t great about picking up poop from our new puppy - right away. So sometimes I have to “break” the frozen poop from the grass or ice. Sometimes that’s not so easy to do, and I really have to get at it. I have been through 3 rolls this winter and not one problem of a hole/tear in the bag, or even the plastic stretching. I even prefer these bags to my “pooper scooper”. All in all, a great product! My only stress now is the training I still have so do... on my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby diapers
customer_reviews.text: I use these for baby diapers (the #2 kind...). I find that if I put them in a bag before putting them into the diaper pail, my house doesn't smell like butt. The ones specifically for baby diapers are hella expensive, and come in rolls of like 3 bags. These bags are great in terms of quantity for money. They are a bit short. I mean, the diapers fit and I can tie the bag, but I wouldn't want to go any smaller. And sometimes it takes some extra effort to get it tied. But they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags that Never Leak
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these bags for 3 years now and have never had any issues. I’ve never had a bag break on me which is saying a lot since I’ve used over 3000 bags. I keep coming back to these for the price and quality. The black is nice because you can’t see what’s inside when you pick it up. I personally don’t use the dispenser regularly but it’s good quality as well if you choose to use it. I would highly recommend these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little bags! This is my third order. I started out with the black bags. I liked them but sometimes had trouble finding the end that opened. My next order was green. You can see the seal at the end that doesn't open. This last order is blue. The sealed end is easy to see on these too. I also like the dispenser that was included. I used to use newspaper bags, but these are so economical and also biodegradable so I feel better about using them. One thousand bags last a long time! I have a summer home so I keep one order at each place. I have enough bags to last a really long time!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our dog
customer_reviews.text: I included pictures of the little bag dispenser we use because these bags work just fine in this dispenser. The bags will likely work in similar styles too. And I also included a pic of one bag next to a ruler to show the length (but keep in mind that the bag is still folded and does not show the width). Ok, so our dog is small (about 12 lbs) and these bags work just fine. (For larger dogs, check other reviews.) We've had zero issues and the whole box of bags look fine as well. I hope this helps you in your decision-making process. Happy dog-walking!
customer_reviews.author: CRMB

customer_reviews.title: Bags are shorter than my old bags
customer_reviews.text: Dispenser broke within a few days. Bags are shorter than previous brand. I do like that they don’t have the cardboard in the center of roll, but if you use a cloth type holder, they bags will fall out as you use up the roll. And, I love that they are perforated/cut at the end of each bag so you can easily pull them apart. I lived the holder that came with it as it had a little hook that pulled it apart but mine broke.
customer_reviews.author: Trixyinaz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, love the dispenser and more bags per roll
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to see that the little white bone-shaped dispenser is really high quality and dispenses bags more smoothly on the side of the bone, rather than the end, and has a little click to tear the bag more easily. It also clicks open smoothly lengthwise. Love the design. The bags are a tad shorter than Amazon's brand, and lighter weight, but work great. I always felt like I was wasting the extra plastic in the other kind. Look for number of bags per roll at 20 vs. 15, so you don't have to change the rolls as often.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Name

customer_reviews.title: Best bags I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using pet waste bags for 13 years. These bags are the best I have ever used. My favorite part is that hole that helps to get the bag off of the roll. I run in the dark with my dog and it is super helpful that they tear away quickly and easily. I have NEVER put a hole in the bag either. I love the amount that comes in the pack. I feel like it has been forever since I last ordered. The only thing I would change is the size. They could be just a bit larger. I have a greyhound. Use your imagination :)
customer_reviews.author: sr1234

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those things you don't fully appreciate until you've tried the crappy kind first. I've used the cheap black bags that are a pain in the butt to pull apart and feel so thin that you think it might rip. In fact, I've even had some rip while trying to tear it off. Not with these. We still have SO MANY left and they're fantastic. Very silky and easily tear at the seams. Also quite thick as to do the job intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mia bergstrom

customer_reviews.title: Product 3, company 5
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for years without a problem. Opened the box and noted small cuts in a bag fresh off the roll. Same with the next 5 bags. Next roll was fine, but the next few rolls had cuts along fold lines and seams. I contacted the company and they were good enough to send out a new box. Good thing, because the next roll from the old box had large tears and cuts in the roll. This was an obvious manufacturing defect, and I was gratified that Gorilla Supply remedied the situation.
customer_reviews.author: rottigirl

customer_reviews.title: Not sure where to start
customer_reviews.text: I had no issues with the first several rolls. Now I am about a third of the way through the box and the bags are coming out unsealed, sealed on both ends or just fine. So I am only getting a third of the use of what I paid for. The rolls, of which they say is 50, I go through it in about 7-10 days since for each poop I am pulling 2 or three bags out.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bags Work Well
customer_reviews.text: 1/13/2019 I updated my review and downgraded review. I may have been too harsh. I do have some issues, hit and miss with opening bags. They get the job done and are a great price. Almost 5 star, but too think and not always easy to open. More like 4 1/2 stars. The #1 thing in a poop bag for me is being able to open quickly. I can open these with ease. Other bags claimed to be easy open and I found them to be challenging enough that I tore some and threw them in trash before use in frustration. Have not had this problem with this bag. Open, pick up, throw away.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelA

customer_reviews.title: the bags are good quality and pretty thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box 11 months ago and I am still working through it. I have a fairly large dog (who does her thing) and also babysit other dogs every 6 weeks or so. The box of 1000 doggy bags will definitely last for at least a full year and when its gone I will immediately buying another one. Also, the bags are good quality and pretty thick. I never have to worry about them tearing in my backpack when we are hiking, camping, and/or backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Seneca

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable with easy to use dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and the ease of loading the dispenser. The bags don't always line up right but likely user error- still better than other dispensers. Bags do not tear at seams like dollar store bags, but also aren't overly large. My dogs are 32 and 35 lbs and these have plenty of room to accommodate larger dogs business. Probably not Great Dane size, but would work for a lab or pit bull. They are reliable and a fantastic substitute for the bags Costco used to sell. Will continue to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deadwood Craftsman

customer_reviews.title: Best bags gping
customer_reviews.text: Lots of bags per roll and the lack of the center piece allows me to add a spare roll to my zippered dispenser when I have used just a few bags from the first roll. I have big labs and they could be a tiny bit bigger but the bigger bags don't have many per roll so for 3 walks a day, I will use 2 on the rate occasion I need them. The bags are easy to rip apart and quality is great. I don't like scented bags so these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: For all of life’s little treasures
customer_reviews.text: When my Peety makes, I stand at the ready with these little dandies, anxiously awaiting the shake of his hind legs to ease as he lifts his hips and acknowledges, but for a moment, his little warm treasures he made in his pristine fenced-in yard. I love you Peety, you give life meaning, and it’s an honor to scoop your poop with these gorilla top quality bags. Thank you gorilla, for allowing me to service my little Peety with pride and honor. Oh and did I mention they smell great before and after scooping, dig in friends, dig in
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Be careful while opening box. I opened the end and ended up having to remove all the rolls to find the dispenser. There is a Perforation on the long side of the box which dispenses the rolls. However the dispenser was in the very center of all the rolls in the box. The bags work great coming out of the dispenser. I’ve used many bag dispensers and this is the easiest one. I also like that each roll has no cardboard or plastic tube.
customer_reviews.author: Cherilyn

customer_reviews.title: great option
customer_reviews.text: First, love that they come in bulk so I don't have to mess around buying them now for a long, long time. Second, the dispenser is the BEST! Can't tell you how much time I spent searching on the old bags for the tear away spot and sometimes ripped the bag up trying to get it free. This is a snap. Thank you! Third, the cardboard box it all comes in has a tear-off opening so you can store all the rolls of bags neatly in a cupboard and then pull out the rolls one at a time without the whole bunch spilling and scattering. Well done! Who knew I could get so excited about dog poop baggies???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: see through and short
customer_reviews.text: These bags are too short and they're see through! I wanted a colored bag so as to not be able to see through it when carrying a bag of doggy poop! Ridiculous. No wonder they were that price for 1,000 of them! Not happy at all with these as now I have to double bag them plus they're not easy to just tie in a knot cause they're so short.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed this order
customer_reviews.text: I have forgotten how many times I have ordered these bags . Up until recently I had three dogs but even with two I go through ALOT of bags . This last box I noticed several defective bags . At first I thought it was just a rare occurrence but I am finding more and more . Thank goodness I always tie three to four around my leash handle, it can be a disaster to open a bag only to find the whole side is opened ! Seems the bags are thinner also
customer_reviews.author: reese

customer_reviews.title: bags with holes!!!  sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product until we came across a roll that have holes and got poop on my hand. ;-( The bottom of each plastic bag should be completely sealed but it was not. Therefore finger can fit thru and poop can get thru. This happened on many bags (not all, I say at least 80%) within the same roll.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: They don't break
customer_reviews.text: These are a little shorter than the All Star bags I had been using, but these were significantly cheaper for a whole lot more bags. And my dogs do love to poop! The bags are sturdy enough to hold their deposits without breaking on my hands, so this is good. Nothing worse than thin bags that fingers break through. My dogs are in the 50-lb range and these bags are perfect for their normal loads. Can't confirm for larger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, durable and biodegradable - great poop bags
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome poop bags! I know, who thinks that hard about poop bags? But with two 13-1/2-year-old Labs, I've gone through a LOT of poop bags over the years. These hold up better than any I've purchased. This is my 4th box and my last box lasted 2 years. Fortunately, Amazon kept track for me so I know how long it lasted. I am someone who will pick up several loads with one bag and these are large enough to use 1 bag on a walk with the 2 dogs and pick up up to 3 loads. Large, durable AND BIODEGRADABLE, which is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: K Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Recurring customer
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these dogs poopoo bags. I will not buy anything else but only these now! The ones I bought in the past were so thin and cheap. Some were false advertisement because it was not a bag. Had the shape of it but it was just a piece of plastic instead of a bag. These ones are thick and the perfect size. And these bags will last you for a good while. Great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Rafaele C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using their bags for several years now and have been a satisfied customer. They have a quality product and I have not encountered issues with holes, ripping, or being impossible to separate at the perforations or open at the seams like many other brands I had tried previously. They are durable and well made. The only thing I wish is they were 9 "x14" like some of their previous generation bags, but I am still pleased with the product and have every intention of continuing to use their brand bags. I have no qualms recommending these bags to others.
customer_reviews.author: DanOPFL

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality poo bags
customer_reviews.text: These poo bags are great!! We have three dogs so we go through a lot of poo bags!! I have experienced low quality bags and it makes for a crappy time!! But seriously the quality of these bags is outstanding. And the dispenser that is included is awesome. Theres a tear notch so it makes getting a new bag out much easier. Also the size is perfect. Not too big or small...the bags are sturdy and tie nicely. I like these and will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Thorsmom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, but not cheap quality!
customer_reviews.text: We've order these several times and never been disappointed. They are unscented, sturdy and easy to dispense. Over the thousands of bags we've used I can only remember a handful not dispensing properly or ripping when you try to pull them out. We've just purchased another set of 1000 and will be sure to buy them again! They are some of the cheapest around in terms of price, but not quality!
customer_reviews.author: glennayouwanna

customer_reviews.title: It's like the bathroom in your house having toilet paper in the dispenser next to the toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Having the bone dispenser makes it convenient to bring with us wherever we go. We used the Velcro strap provided to connect the bone filled with bags to the handle of the leash. Because of this, we never forget and have extras if needed. The bags aren't the biggest and there are times I need 2. But they have to be the size they provided so that they can easily fit in the small bone. I highly recommend and suggest using the Velcro to attach to your leash.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use when I clean the kitty litter boxes. They hold a lot of poop and are sturdy. 1000 bags will last a long time. These bags are well worth the price as I have purchased similar bags at the Dollar Store. Believe me, you get what you pay for. The Dollar Store bags are inconsistent and usually have holes in the seems, something you don’t discover until you actually put poop in it and it falls through the bottom of the bag. I will be purchasing this lot of 1,000 bags again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: momto4

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the Quantities not the QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because of the count. It's too small. When u pick up the poop and when you thigh it be careful or else your hands will have poop. My maltipoo dog poop a LOT! I have to use 2 bags in 1 poop or else I will never able to thigh it. If our dogs poop during our walk I have find trash bin right away because I can smell the poop. Unlike the other bags that we had before. Now, I have to finish all of these bags ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mharje

customer_reviews.title: ... getting the bags to detach from the roll is easy to use and works every time
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism for getting the bags to detach from the roll is easy to use and works every time. The bags are a good size to clean up for both of my corgis at the same time. I end up carrying the bag in "glove mode" for a while waiting on the 2nd dog to poop sometimes and I've yet to have any odor bleed through onto my hands or get a bag with a hole in the bottom. The dispenser is easy to refill with an easy to push button on end that pops it open and holds it securely shut.
customer_reviews.author: Windy

customer_reviews.title: Does doodoo best
customer_reviews.text: Although the included dispenser is pretty useless, (RIP off a bag, and the remaining roll slips into the dispenser and you have to reopen the dispenser and reset the bags.. pain in the butt )the bags do exactly what they are meant to do. But best part ever... where the bags connect to each other to form a roll, there's a gap in the middle you can stick your finger in to very easily separate one bag from the next.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags are slightly thinner than the Amazon ones, but it still gets the job done. Amazon's dog bags were on backorder, and I am glad I got to try these out. These are also a little cheaper, 100 more bags, and there is no plastic dispenser roll in the middle (less plastic waste). Also, there's another option on the Gorilla's storefront to purchase the bags without a dispenser. I have too many dispensers already.
customer_reviews.author: JellyBean

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't trap smell
customer_reviews.text: I wish it's scented because my dog's poop smells SO BAD in these. I didn't realize there is a difference in quality among poopy bags until I got these and could smell my dog's poop while holding it. BTW my dog is a tiny little chihuahua so she doesnt have much poop so I pity those with bigger dogs and have to use these. I was embarrassed to stop and chat with neighbors because I'm worried they would smell the poop -_-
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Valle

customer_reviews.title: Dispenser is a disaster
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who designed the dispenser, but the last thing I want to do when the dog is pulling to walk and I have to pick up poop is to fight to get a bag out. They're also super thin. My husband and I both really disliked the dispenser and bought the Amazon basics bags before using up the first roll of these. I'll keep them around for tiny trash bags in the car or my purse, but they're not even good for out-of-dispenser use. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: If you have a smaller dog, these will last a year or more per box
customer_reviews.text: These just last forever. The last batch I purchased lasted close to 14 months. They're perfect for a small dog (we have a pug). You might be able to make it work for large dogs but these bags just aren't very big so you'll have to put some effort in to tie it closed, if you can do it at all. I hope these are always available. And every box comes with a bag holder you latch onto your leash. Super-convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Right Hand of Doom

customer_reviews.title: Great Poop Bags
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to poop a lot, so when it came to bags, I wanted to pay as little as possible on a per-poop-basis. These bags do the job, and are a good quality. I have not had a bag rip while fighting sticks and branches, or scraping soup-poops off concrete. The bag is also deep enough to enclose my hand and 1/3rd the way to my elbow, so I can safely retrieve the poop, even in tall grasses, and then invert the bag and tie it off. The green is translucent so you can kinda see the contents of the bag, I personally don't have a problem with that, I am guessing the black doesn't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Best switch we've made
customer_reviews.text: We used to use the pricey bags with the scents, but they are expensive in addition to lacking bulk quantities. We switched to the Gorilla bags and while, they are thinner, we've never had a problem. The bags tear easily, hold the poo without leakage and are economical. I couldn't comment on any of the natural elements, but from a practical standpoint, these bags are great.
customer_reviews.author: Huron's Heroes

customer_reviews.title: Not biodegrable - false advertising - dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was a long time customer because these bags were biodegrable. I hate most the lie about these bags being biodegrable when not. The write-up has changed but due to a lack of honesty I will never buy another product from Gorilla Suppy.
customer_reviews.author: Two Cents

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tear off, easy to open, no leakage
customer_reviews.text: I've tried multiple brands of poop bags to keep up with my 100-pound dog. Once he went 5 times in one walk because he was mad at being cooped up due to bad weather. These bags have a gap which automatically tears when you pull. This is a wonderful feature at 4:30 in the morning in freezing weather with a pulling dog. And I have never had a single problem with leakage after using thousands of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Poop Bag and Dispenser is Awesome too!
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product. First of all, it is NOT scented and that's great. So many bags have this strong perfume smell that spreads throughout wherever you store the bags. Thanks to this brand, we can get good bags that are not scented. Secondly, the Gorilla bag is large and strong. Thirdly, the free dispenser is very well made. You will have to order the bags to know what I'm talking about. These bags are handy and inexpensive. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: NSW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I stick with basics brand but I decided to try something different since these were cheaper and you got more. At first I was worried about the dispenser not working properly but I actually love it! So easy to dispense bags, bags a sturdy and perfect size! If I HAD to say something for improvement I would say make the bags black or not as transparent but that’s not a problem for me personally. I’ll definitely be buying these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonn

product_meta.title: Gorilla Supply Dog Waste Bags with Patented Dispenser and Leash Tie, Unscented, EPI Additive (Meets ASTM D6954-04 Tier 1), 1000 Count
product_meta.description: Color:BlueCoreless bags, does not leave any waste. 1000 bags, 20 of 50 rolls, 1 patented dispenser inside. Color: Blue, Standard 9" x 12" size , built strong EPI plastic, leak proof
feature_bullets: Coreless bags, does not leave any waste
1000 Bags, 20 of 50 Rolls, 1 Patented Dispenser Inside
Standard 9" x 12" Size , Built Strong EPI plastic, Leak proof

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
